mapper.insert:
SELECT HOUSEID_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO HOUSE_TB( HOUSEID , PHOTO , ADDRESS, WHOLEAREA, PUBLICUSAGE, BATHROOMS, ROOMS) VALUES (#{HOUSEID} , #{PHOTO} , #{ADDRESS}, #{WHOLEAREA}, #{PUBLICUSAGE}, #{BATHROOMS}, #{ROOMS})
mapper.select: SELECT ADDRESS, WHOLEAREA, PUBLICUSAGE, BATHROOMS, ROOMS FROM HOUSE_TB
SELECT PHOTO, ADDRESS, WHOLEAREA, PUBLICUSAGE, BATHROOMS, ROOMS FROM HOUSE_TB WHERE HOUSEID = (SELECT HOUSEID FROM sharehouse_tb WHERE house_tb.houseid = #{HOUSEID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HOUSE_TB SET ADDRESS, WHOLEAREA, PUBLICUSAGE, BATHROOMS, ROOMS WHERE HOUSEID = #{HOUSEID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HOUSE_TB WHERE MEMBERID =(SELECT MEMBERID FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE HOUSE_TB.MEMBERID = #{MEMBERID})
